document_data.name: Tabacco
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LJ/A Gathering of Heroes Interactive}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tabacco''', also known as '''tobacco''', was a type of [[pipeweed]] – a dark plant with a sweet scent indigenous to [[Nexal]]{{Cite polyhedron/129/Agriculture, Invention, and Society in Malatra|30}}{{Cite web/theedverse/2024-1-2 - Pipeweed}}
document_data.Description: Tabacco leaves could be smoked in pipes, similarly to pipeweed of [[Faerûn]], but it was also possible to roll them in [[cigar]]s. In all applications, tabacco was said to be far superior in flavor to pipeweed.
document_data.Usages: The spell ''[[witchweed (spell)|witchweed]]'' required the burning of tabacco as a [[material component]].
document_data.Notable Users: ''Circa'' [[1367 DR]], in [[Ghars]], [[Cormyr]], tobacco was smoked by Mayor [[Tobald]] and in a pipe by [[Benelaius]]. A tobacconist in town sold both tobacco and pipeweed.
